name: Slime Cube (PixelDough)
description:
Created as part of the Monogame Jam for Frens game jam!

It's a short puzzle platformer prototype about a slime who can divide himself. I might do more with this prototype later, as it's an idea I like but felt I could not properly flesh out in the span of a little over 48 hours for the jam.

Press F11 to toggle Fullscreen. Press Escape to quit.
